name: Greenscape flatformer
description:
A small fast paced platformer game with a single level
you objective is to reach till the very end while collecting as many gems as possible and avoiding to get hit by the ever expanding red "dead zone" 

this is the first game which i forced myself to finish and share it, even tho i myself feel like it needs much more work i had to share it, just so i can get any possible feedback and improve myself as a starting indie developer.
